=== Optional testcases ===

==== Notes ====

''
* There is no enable network menu option in NetworkManager for this test. Just click on the AP name to connect, "Disconnect" menu item to disconnect.
* Suspend/Hibernate does not work at all. If the laptop goes into suspend mode, it does not resume everything when it awakes, and Firefox always crashes during resume
* Compiz crashes periodically. (Bug report has been submitted)
* Applications button pops up a window with icons and a scroll bar, but unable to scroll.
''
